news_header: Shooting incident in Guerrero leaves 16 dead, including police officers.
news_text: A shooting incident between two gangs in the west coast of Guerrero resulted in at least 16 fatalities, including two police officers, and injured four others. The National Guard was also involved in the response. Guerrero, one of Mexico's poorest states, has a history of violence related to drug cartels, with nearly 1,900 firearms reported in the area last year.
